question: Which force is known as the "Sentinelese of North East"?
explanation: Assam Rifles is known as “Sentinels of the Northeast”. Its headquarters are located at Laitkor (Shillong). The motto of Assam Rifles is “Friends of the Hill People”. There are currently 46 battalions of Assam Rifles. While Assam Rifles functions under the Ministry of Defence, its administrative control is under the Ministry of Home Affairs.
